verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Let praises rise
From the inside
From the inside of me
May you delight
In the inside
In the inside of me
Come fill my life
From the inside
From the inside of me
Set me on fire
From the inside
From the inside of me

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Cos all I want
Is for you
You to be glorified
You to be lifted high
All I want
Is for you
You to be glorified
You to be lifted high

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Let praises rise
From the inside
From the inside of me
May you delight
In the inside
In the inside of me
Come fill my life
From the inside
From the inside of me
Set me on fire
From the inside
From the inside of me

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Cos all I want
Is for you
You to be glorified
You to be lifted high
All I want
Is for you
You to be glorified
You to be lifted high

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Fill my life
Till all they see
Is you Lord
Glorify Your name

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Fill my life
Till all they see
Is you Lord
Glorify Your name

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Fill my life
Till all they see
Is you Lord
Glorify

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
Cos all I want
Is for you
You to be glorified
You to be lifted high
All I want
Is for you
You to be glorified
You to be lifted high
